alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lamoille, northern Caledonia, southwestern Orleans, northeastern Chittenden, northwestern Washington and southeastern Franklin Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Stowe, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lyndon, Morrisville, Greensboro, Johnson Village, Eden, Cambridge, Stannard, Cambridge Village, Stowe, Glover, Hardwick, Albany, Westford, Jeffersonville Village, Hyde Park, Wolcott, Greensboro Bend, Belvidere Center, Belvidere and Waterville. This includes Interstate 91 between mile markers 139 and 147. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central, northeastern and northwestern Vermont.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington; Western Chittenden
